author: Rosie
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog, if you run into any issues or have any questions, you can find me in the Red servers or DM me @blizzthewolf. You are also free to open an issue on [my repository](https://git.purplepanda.cc/blizz/blizz-cogs).
name: Message
short: Allow moderators to message a user via the bot.
description: Allow moderators to message a user via the bot.
